name: A Modern Life Tale
description:
Many years have passed after the Kappian Industrial Revolution, where technology is infused with magic to enshroud science and protect youkai from scientific extinction. You play as Nazrin and Mokou (soon tm) who go about their daily life in this Neo-Gensokyo.

This story features:

  • A unfortunately linear-ish story, I'll change it one day
  • A bit of depression
  • A lot of fun
  • A few references to funny internet material like any game should
  • Romance; what else but hot steamy youkai sapphic love making for the average touhou fan. It's not really erotic, it's rather wholesome if anything.
  • Nazrin is a death grips fan, this is canon now. You cannot argue otherwise.
  • Crimbus seasons, for a holiday cheer!
  • I'm running out of things to feature but it's also a secret santa for someone. You know who you are.
